population_density.long_name: Population Density: People Per Square Mile
population_density.long_description: Population density, or number of people per square mile, as calculated from census ACS population data and shapefile areas: \[\frac{population_{r}}{meters^{2}_{r}}1609.344^{2}\] Where r is each region (e.g., census tract or county).
population_density.statement: There are {value} people per square mile in {region_name}.

sources.name: American Community Survey
sources.location: 5-Year estimates, table B01003, via the API
